XXn2856u_001:26: oṃ phaṭ ity uccārayan krodhamuṣṭiṃ hṛd-ūrṇā-mūrddhasu vinyasya mukha-śaucādikaṃ
XXn2856u_001:27: kṛtvā deva-gṛhaṃ praviśya paṭādi-gata-mūrttiṃ bhagavatīṃ avatāryya mārīcī-vighnotsāraṇa-mantreṇa
XXn2856u_001:36: vighnot-sāraṇa-mantraḥ oṃ mārīcyai huṃ sarvva-vighnān utsāraya huṃ phaṭ | tataḥ
XXn2856u_001:37: svahṛdayakṣareṇa niśi candra-maṇḍalaṃ divā sūryya-mandalaṃ ā-kāreṇa dhyātvā
XXn2856u_001:42: tate viśva-raśmīn niścāryya tai raśmibhir niṣpannāṃ
XXn2856u_001:43: bhagavatiṃ mūrddhni guru-buddha-bodhisattvāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā pūjayitvā abhivandya ca
XXn2856u_001:44: anena mantreṇa oṃ mārīcyai puṣpaṃ pratīcca svāhā ,
XXn2856u_001:67: ābodheḥ śaraṇaṃ yāmi buddhaṃ dharmmaṃ guṇottamam ,
XXn2856u_001:108: dṛśyate spṛśyate caiva yathā māyā hi sarvvataḥ ,
XXn2856u_001:112: na copalabhyate caiva sarvvasya jagataḥ sthitiḥ |
XXn2856u_001:122: sarvva-dharmmāḥ sva-bhāva-śudho'ham iti vāra-trayam uccāryya tataḥ pūrvvokta-bīja-niṣpannaṃ
XXn2856u_001:123: candraṃ tasyopari oṃ-kāraṃ tat sarvvaṃ pariṇamya śrīmad-vairocana-nāthaṃ
XXn2856u_001:133: pañca-viṃśatikam akṣaraṃ paramahṛdayaṃ prathamasya dvitīyena samā-yuktaṃ
XXn2856u_001:135: candra-stha-mā-kāraṃ dhyātvā tat sarvvapariṇatam ātmānaṃ mārīcī-rūpeṇa bhāvayet
XXn2856u_001:136: aham eva mārīcī bhagavatī iti su-pītāṃ jāmbhū-nada-prabhākārāṃ dīpta-dehāṃ caitya-garbha-sthāṃ
XXn2856u_001:152: vairocana-kṛta-mūrddha-jāṃ aśoka-mālā śirasi bhuṣitāṃ vāma-karair akṣasūtrāśoka-cāpa-dharāṃ
XXn2856u_001:157: bhayasyāpi bhayaṅkaraṃ dakṣiṇa-mukhaṃ su-raktaṃ divya-jvalad-bhāsuram iva ,
XXn2856u_001:159: śirasi vairocanaṃ nāthaṃ pūrvvokta-varṇa-mudropetam adhaḥstāt sapta-śukara-ratha-gatāṃ
XXn2856u_001:166: ha-kara-pariṇataṃ rāhu-grahaṃ hastābhyāṃ grastaṃ candra-sūryyau divā dinakaraṃ
XXn2856u_001:174: tatra pūrvvena oṃ mārīcyai varttāli vadāli varāli
XXn2856u_001:175: varāhamukhi siddhim ākarṣaya jaḥ svāheti evaṃ devīṃ rakta-varṇāṃ varāhaikamukhīṃ
XXn2856u_001:176: catur-bhujāṃ rakta-kañcukottarīyāṃ vāme pāśāśoka-hastāṃ dakṣiṇe vajrāṅkuśa-sūci-dharāṃ
XXn2856u_001:184: oṃ mārīcyai varttāli vadāli varāli varāhamukhi
XXn2856u_001:185: sarvva-duṣṭa-praduṣṭānāṃ mukhaṃ bandha bandha huṃ svāhā |
XXn2856u_001:187: pīta-varṇāṃ vāme paśa-vajra-dharāṃ dakṣiṇe pallava-sūcī-dharāṃ duṣṭānāṃ
XXn2856u_001:195: oṃ mārīcyai varttāli vadāli varāli varāhamukhi
XXn2856u_001:196: sarvva-duṣṭān stambhaya va svāheti varālīṃ devīṃ tadvat vastrābharaṇa-varṇaṃ
XXn2856u_001:218: oṃ mārīcyai varttāli vadāli varāli varāhamukhi
XXn2856u_001:219: sarvva-satvtān me vaśam ānaya hoḥ svāheti varāha-mukhīṃ devīṃ rakta-varṇāṃ tathā-vastrābharaṇaṃ
XXn2856u_001:220: ca savyena vajra-śara-dhāriṇīṃ vāme aśoka-cāpa-dharāṃ sarvva-sattvān
XXn2856u_001:230: jñāna-sattvarn ākṛṣya praveśya baddhvā vaśīkṛtya sādhayet |
XXn2856u_001:237: oṃ vajrāṅkuśi jaḥ ity anena jñāna-sattvam ākṛṣya
XXn2856u_001:243: bandhayet , oṃ vajrāveśa hoḥ anena toṣayet |
XXn2856u_001:271: eṣā mudrā varā śreṣṭhā sarvva-karmmasu yojayet ,
XXn2856u_001:290: iti mūrddhni sthāpya oṃ bhūḥ kha mā abhiṣiṅceti
XXn2856u_001:291: mantreṇa vairocanaḥ kanakābho bodhyaṅgy-avasthitaḥ śirasi dhyeyah |
XXn2856u_001:294: sva-hṛdi candra-sthaṃ mantraṃ dedīpyamānam oṃ mārīcyai svāheti dṛṣṭvā
XXn2856u_001:328: sarvva-karmmasu ca me cittam śreyaḥ kuru ,
XXn2856u_001:338: visarjjana-kāle tu sarvvam etat kuśalaṃ pariṇamya
XXn2856u_001:339: abhipretāṃ siddhim abhiyācya sva-mudrāṃ śirasi muṅcet oṃ mārīcyai mur iti |
XXn2856u_001:348: ity anena krameṇa kāya-vāk-citta-rakṣāṃ kṛtvā yathāsukhaṃ
XXn2856u_001:361: oṃ kha kha khādi khādi gṛhṇa gṛhṇa gṛhṇantu sārvva-bhautikā
XXn2856u_001:362: baliṃ mama śāntiṃ kurvvantu svāheti bali-mantraḥ
